content: Shopping Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Jun 2019Anyone here has LiveUp membership?I heard they amended the package and am still considering if i should get it or not. What do you all think? Is it still worth subscribing?2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 05 Jun 2019Yes I did. With the free delivery only for Redmart, I wouldn't go for it. It's possible to hit free delivery in any case, if you purchase beyond a certain amount. And that's what I use online groceries for - to buy toiletries in bulk such that I can hit the free shipping and not have to lug 60 toilets rolls home. My mum does ask me if I'm preparing for the war though, when she sees the large stash of toilet rolls in the store room ðŸ˜‚0 comments2

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Jun 2019Not worth it. Left with free delivery above $40 for redmart only. 4% rebate for redmart and lazmall only. No more free delivery and rebate for lazada, lazmall and taobao.0 comments2
